HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Delivery of a shipment with a value of less than 50.00 euros is charged 5.00 euros.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 2 to 5 working days on the territory of continental Croatia, and from 3 to 7 working days on the islands.

weekend_delivery.days: Delivery of products is carried out only on working days from Monday to Friday. Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays are not considered working days.

HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to islands takes longer (3 to 7 working days), but no extra surcharge is mentioned.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The only available delivery method is home delivery. In-store pickup, parcel shops, and parcel lockers are not mentioned.
PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled exclusively by In Time d.o.o.
PRICING: Delivery is free for orders over €50.00; for orders below this amount, the shipping cost is €5.00.
DELIVERY TIMES & RESTRICTIONS: Standard delivery time is 2-5 working days for mainland Croatia and 3-7 working days for islands. Deliveries are made only on weekdays (Monday-Friday). Cash on delivery is available for orders within Croatia, with no specified surcharge.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The company offers delivery throughout the European Union. All shipments are insured by Dicta d.o.o.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is located within the 'Opći uvjeti' (General Terms) page under the 'Dostava' (Delivery) section. The information provided is clear and covers the essentials for home delivery. However, finding this information could be more intuitive if placed on a dedicated, easily accessible shipping page. There is a lack of information regarding other common delivery methods.
